title: Medical Image Classification with KAN-Integrated Transformers and Dilated Neighborhood Attention
details: ON Manzari, H Asgariandehkordi, T Koleilat, Y Xiao… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2025
abstract: Convolutional networks, transformers, hybrid models, and Mamba-based architectures have demonstrated strong performance across various medical image classification tasks. However, these methods were primarily designed to classify …
